content: पौरुष {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (षी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [पुरुष-अण्] {@--1@} Relating to a man or man in general, human. {@--2@} Manly, virile. {@--3@} Sacred to {%Puruṣa%}. --षः A weight which can be carried by one man. --षी A woman. --षं {@--1@} Human action, man's work, exer tion, effort; धिग्धिग्वृथा पौरुषं <ls>Bh. 2. 38</ls>; दैवं निहत्य कुरु पौरुषमात्मशक्त्या <ls>Pt. 1. 361</ls>; <ls n="Pt.">2. 81.</ls> {@--2@} ({%a%}) Heroism, prowess, valour, manliness, courage; पौरुषभूषणः <ls>R. 15. 28</ls>; <ls n="R.">8. 28.</ls> ({%b%}) Strength, power, vigour. {@--3@} Virility; <ls>Bg. 7. 8.</ls> {@--4@} Semen virile. {@--5@} Penis. {@--6@} The full height of a man, the height to which he reaches with both arms elevated and the fingers extended. {@--7@} Sundial.
